purpose: Defines safe and unsafe language patterns for accessibility documentation to balance transparency with legal protection

availableNow.qualifier: Always qualify with context like 'varies by module' or 'in select features'

planned.usage: On roadmap but not yet started

partialSupport.usage: Works in some contexts, not others

notSupported.usage: Currently not available (use sparingly in external docs)

currentStatus: Feature X is available in current release
Feature Y is included in version [specific version]
This capability is present in [specific modules/contexts]
Substantial conformance with WCAG 2.2 Level AA
qualifiers: varies by version, module, or configuration
Enhancement priorities and timelines are subject to change
based on technical feasibility, resource availability, and user feedback
depends on specific user requirements, software version, module design, and current technical capabilities

avoid: All users will be able to...

useInstead: Working toward WCAG 2.2 Level AA conformance

sections.accuracyAndCurrency: Information in this document reflects {{PRODUCT_NAME}}'s accessibility status and plans as of {{PUBLICATION_DATE}}. Accessibility features, enhancement priorities, timelines, and capabilities are subject to change without notice.
sections.noGuarantees: Descriptions of planned enhancements, features under development, or future capabilities should not be interpreted as commitments or guarantees. Actual implementation and timing may vary based on technical feasibility, resource allocation, and business priorities.
sections.individualNeeds: Accommodation feasibility depends on specific user requirements, software version, module design, and current technical capabilities. We recommend contacting {{ACCESSIBILITY_CONTACT}} for individualized consultation regarding specific accommodation requests.
sections.thirdPartyContent: [If applicable] Some {{PRODUCT_NAME}} content is developed by third parties. Accessibility features and accommodation options may vary by content source.
sections.competitiveInformation: [If applicable] Comparative statements about other vendors' accessibility are based on publicly available information as of {{DATE}} and may not reflect current capabilities.
sections.legalInterpretation: This document is provided for informational purposes and should not be construed as legal advice or legal compliance certification. Organizations should consult with their own legal counsel regarding accessibility obligations.
sections.contact: For questions about information in this document: {{ACCESSIBILITY_EMAIL}}

safePatterns: {{PRODUCT_NAME}} provides more accessibility documentation than most competing {{CATEGORY}} platforms
Based on publicly available information, most competing {{CATEGORY}} platforms have not published comparable accessibility documentation
Most competing vendors have not published accessibility information or VPATs
competitiveComparison.note: Competitive information is based on publicly available documentation and may not reflect current capabilities
